agents.name: Data Science Pyramid Expert
agents.capabilities: Analyzes project insights, suggests additional analyses, and provides probing questions to enhance analytical value and depth

agents.name: NEAR Blockchain Analyst
agents.capabilities: Writes SQL queries for analyzing NEAR blockchain data using Flipside's NEAR schema, specializing in on-chain metrics and patterns. Include 'STRICT MODE' in the request to get exclusively a SQL response with no ``` markdown. Returns a list of text (the response) and usage (tokens used)

agents.name: Expert-EVM
agents.capabilities: Flipside compliant Snowflake SQL generator for Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) chains including arbitrum, avalanche, base, blast, bsc, ethereum, gnosis, ink, kaia, mantle, optimism, polygon. Include 'STRICT MODE' in the request to get exclusively a SQL response with no ``` markdown. Returns a list of text (the response) and usage (tokens used)
